name: archipelago-json
description: Archipelago JSON Export Tools - A frontend-focused fork that exports Archipelago game logic to JSON and provides a web-based client with advanced tracking.

scripts.test: TEST_MODE=${npm_config_mode:-test} TEST_GAME=${npm_config_game:-} TEST_SEED=${npm_config_seed:-} RULES_OVERRIDE=${npm_config_rules:-} TEST_LAYOUT=${npm_config_layout:-} playwright test tests/e2e/app.spec.js
scripts.test:headed: TEST_MODE=${npm_config_mode:-test} TEST_GAME=${npm_config_game:-} TEST_SEED=${npm_config_seed:-} RULES_OVERRIDE=${npm_config_rules:-} TEST_LAYOUT=${npm_config_layout:-} playwright test tests/e2e/app.spec.js --headed
scripts.test:debug: TEST_MODE=${npm_config_mode:-test} TEST_GAME=${npm_config_game:-} TEST_SEED=${npm_config_seed:-} RULES_OVERRIDE=${npm_config_rules:-} TEST_LAYOUT=${npm_config_layout:-} playwright test tests/e2e/app.spec.js --debug
scripts.test:ui: TEST_MODE=${npm_config_mode:-test} TEST_GAME=${npm_config_game:-} TEST_SEED=${npm_config_seed:-} RULES_OVERRIDE=${npm_config_rules:-} TEST_LAYOUT=${npm_config_layout:-} playwright test tests/e2e/app.spec.js --ui
scripts.test:full-suite: npm run test:health && npm test && npm run test:analyze
